prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek design and striking red patterns.
Generate a Pokemon that has a fierce look, with sharp fins and an aggressive stance.
I want to see a design for a fish-like Pokemon that dominates its aquatic environment.
Imagine a Pokemon that can blend into ocean depths, featuring vibrant green scales.
Show me a Pokemon that excels in underwater battles, showcasing powerful swimming abilities.
Design a Pokemon with spiky features and a menacing smile, perfect for a water type.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a fierce predator of the sea, with unique color combinations.
